Uses of Interface
com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.state.StateRepository

  • Packages that use StateRepository 
    Package Description
    com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.state
    Defines the StateBuilder interface, which represents a class which can build an instance of a state class from an aggregate's event history, and the StateRepository interface, which represents a class that can retrieve state objects by aggregate id.
    com.opencredo.concursus.mapping.events.methods.state  

    • Uses of StateRepository in com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.state

      Classes in com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.state that implement StateRepository 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EventSourcingStateRepository<T> 

    • Uses of StateRepository in com.opencredo.concursus.mapping.events.methods.state

      Methods in com.opencredo.concursus.mapping.events.methods.state that return StateRepository 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> StateRepository<T> DispatchingStateRepository.using(EventSource eventSource, Class<? extends T> stateClass)
      Create a StateRepository, drawing on the supplied EventSource, which uses a DispatchingStateBuilder to construct state objects of the given class.
